# actionSheetStyle

**Instance Property**

The receiver’s presentation style.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var actionSheetStyle: UIActionSheetStyle { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property determines how the action sheet looks when it is presented. For a list of possible values, see the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIActionSheetStyle] constants.

## Setting properties

- **delegate**: The receiver’s delegate or `nil` if it doesn’t have a delegate.
- **title**: The string that appears in the receiver’s title bar.
- **isVisible**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver is displayed.
